A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disregard the efforts of weirdos and bots to pointlessly review bomb this movie. The last Jedi is the star wars movie that both diehard fans and new adapters deserve. Rian Johnson was able to write a love letter to the original series while also driving the story in amazing and unexpected new directions. Absolutely worth the watch I'd only to see Mark Hammil in a perfect performance.
